title: How many followers of Haile Selassie are there? - Quora

response.answer_text: How has he been all around the world met with all ethnicities and social status. In a main fight during WWII when Hitler and Mussolini trying to wipe him off of the map Ethiopia; in 1930 he was crowned Emperor & 72 nations bowed to him!!!!! That was prophesied by Marcus Mosiah Garvey the crowning of the king in Africa sometime in the 1920’s how could he have helped so many people and still be like a Where’s Waldo game but instead Where’s Selassie I?
